page.title: 06TRANSPORT IN BASSINGBOURN
page.content: Between 8am and 2pm on Friday 11th July, some children did a transport survey. We recorded the information on a tally chart. It was split up into nine categories. {Car Van Lorry M/bike Bike Bus Farm 419 80 23 19 102 17 5 {Community Wheelchair 11 1 {Total:}713 Most cars were spotted during 8.00-9.00, because it is parents going to work and bringing their children to school. It is the same with the cycles because some children use their bikes to come to school. The lorries are consistent because of deliveries to different places at different times. Community service vehicles include Police cars, Ambulance, Fire engines and Taxis. Even though we have a good farming area we saw only 5 vehicles. See{page 20}for{wheelchair.}
